comment: Just as a suggestion you may want to look into an oxygenation setup if you don't already have one. Also do you do yeast starters? Both of these will help a real lot for the attenuation of the yeast and give you a lower FG and the dryness you may be looking for.
Thanks, Shaun. I've been thinking about getting an oxygen system. I didn't use a start for this batch, but I have in the past and should probably do it more often. Cheers!
